# Security Policy for QRSay-Admin-Restaurant-Management-Mobile-App

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take the security of our project very seriously. If you discover any security vulnerabilities in `QRSay-Admin-Restaurant-Management-Mobile-App`, please report it immediately to us.

## How to Report

1.  **Discover:** Identify a potential security vulnerability.
2.  **Report:** Please report the vulnerability by sending an email to `chirag127@users.noreply.github.com`. 
    *   **Subject:** Security Vulnerability Report - QRSay-Admin-Restaurant-Management-Mobile-App
    *   **Body:** Provide a detailed description of the vulnerability, including:
        *   The affected component or feature.
        *   Steps to reproduce the vulnerability.
        *   Any potential impact.
        *   (If applicable) Proposed mitigation or fix.

## Our Commitment

*   We will acknowledge your report within **2 business days**.
*   We will investigate the reported vulnerability promptly and prioritize its remediation.
*   We will keep you informed about the progress of the investigation and fix.
*   We will not take any action against individuals or groups who report vulnerabilities in good faith, provided they do not violate any laws or engage in malicious activities.

## Supported Security Updates

This project is actively maintained. We aim to address all reported security vulnerabilities as quickly as possible. The core technologies used are:

*   **React Native:** Regularly updated to the latest stable versions to incorporate security patches.
*   **Expo:** Leverages Expo's continuous security updates and best practices.
*   **JavaScript/TypeScript:** Adherence to modern JavaScript security standards and best practices.

We monitor security advisories for all direct and transitive dependencies. Users are encouraged to keep their `QRSay-Admin-Restaurant-Management-Mobile-App` installations updated to the latest releases to benefit from security fixes.

## Responsible Disclosure

We encourage responsible disclosure of security vulnerabilities. Please do not disclose vulnerabilities publicly until they have been resolved and a fix has been released. Unauthorized access, modification, or destruction of data is strictly prohibited.

**Repository:** [QRSay-Admin-Restaurant-Management-Mobile-App](https://github.com/chirag127/QRSay-Admin-Restaurant-Management-Mobile-App)

Thank you for helping to keep `QRSay-Admin-Restaurant-Management-Mobile-App` secure!
